channel.title: Need help fixing the clicking
channel.description:
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=29fbc7l&s=4
Here is a video of the problem. When i click on the right of the button it does cancels, but when i click the left it logs in. I need help getting rid of the cancel, and fixing the login thing.
Thank you, Owner of Flamescape
